Metadata.title: Nomeon | Business & IT Solutions
Metadata.description: Pragmatic solutions for messy processes. From ERP systems and data pipelines to simulations and custom internal tools; I care more about what it solves than how shiny it looks.

IntroSection.name: Stijn Nijhuis.
IntroSection.catchphrase: I build pragmatic solutions for messy processes.
IntroSection.description: Bridging Business & IT: figuring out how a company really works, then implementing or building the software that makes it less chaotic. From ERP systems and data pipelines to simulations and custom internal tools; I care more about what it solves than how shiny it looks.
